Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value. With its unique features and high-quality materials, this product stands out in its category. I believe it could significantly enhance your experience or meet a specific need you have. Considering its craftsmanship and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $200 for it. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
